Past_Continuous_Tense_key1:
Past contiunous tense -
sabse phle aap ye videos dekhe -
Past_Continuous_Tense_key2:
Definition :-
past tense describe action and events before some time. Identity of past continuous tense At the end of the sentense i was there, it is called past continuouse tense.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key3:
Structure :-
subject + auxiliary verb + main verb +ing + object
Auxiliary verb means - sahyak kiriya
Past_Continuous_Tense_key4:
main verb means - mukhy kiriya
past continuous tense auxiliary verb are was/were
Past_Continuous_Tense_key5:
use in singular noun ( I,she , he, If)=was
use in plural noun(we,you,they)=were
Examples :-
Simple sentence
Past_Continuous_Tense_key9: She was making preparation for the exam.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key10:
The dog was breaking at them.
Examples :-
Negative sentence
Subject +auxilary verb +not +main verb+ing +object
Past_Continuous_Tense_key11: I was not accepting such a foolish behaviour from him.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key13: He was not washing her clothes.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key15:
You were not driving carefully.
Examples :-
Interrogative sentence
Auxiliray verb +subject+main verb+ing +object
Past_Continuous_Tense_key16: Were they going to their college.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key17: Was he coming to his home.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key20:
Was i calling you.
Practice  questions :- 
A. I …………………….. TV at eight o’clock yesterday evening.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key23:
watched
B. I …………………… all day yesterday.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key26:
have painted
C. They ………………………… the whole time they were together.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key29:
were quarreling
D. As I …………………….. down the road, I saw Philip.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key32:
was walking
E. The phone rang while I …………………………. dinner.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key35:
was having
F. It happened while I ……………………….. in Southampton last year.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key38:
am living
G. When I entered her room, she ………………………. the piano.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key41:
was playing
H. When I got up this morning, the sun ………………………….
Past_Continuous_Tense_key44:
is shining
I. At the time when it happened, I ……………………… to the opera a lot.
Past_Continuous_Tense_key48:
Answers-
A) was watching
B) was painting
C) were quarreling
D) was walking
E) was having
F) was living
G) was playing
H) was playing
